page.title: 06Main Employers for Uxbridge
page.content: The Local Authority is our largest employer.Hillingdon Hospital,the Ministry of Defence,R.A.F.Uxbridge, Heathrow Airport and London Transport employ large numbers of people also. There are about 200 smaller firms in the Uxbridge area which employ less than 500 people.Large firms outside the Borough such as Nestles and E.M.I.employ large numbers of Hillingdon residents.Many people use cars,trains,or buses to get to work,as many of our industries are near to major roads such as the A40,or the Canal.There are a few farms in our area that employ seasonal workers,and there are two flour mills.There are small firms making office machinery, electronic components,main frame computing,technical publishing and crane repairing.Two large motor vehicle headquarters are in Uxbridge.
